predictions.text: U.S. CPI Core (YoY, CPI-U all items less food and energy) for October 2025 will print between 3.1% and 3.4%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in BLS CPI news release for October 2025: 12-month percent change for 'All items less food and energy' (core CPI, not seasonally adjusted) must be ≥3.1% and ≤3.4%.
monitoring_signals: Cleveland Fed core CPI nowcast for Oct 2025
Zillow and Apartment List rent indices (shelter/OER lead)
Manheim Used Vehicle Value Index trend
Average hourly earnings and unit labor costs
predictions.rationale: Core disinflation continues as goods deflate and shelter slows; risks from energy are limited for core.

predictions.text: Euro area GDP (QoQ, SA, flash) for Q3 2025 will print between 0.0% and 0.2%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Eurostat flash estimate for quarterly GDP growth rate (seasonally adjusted) for Q3 2025 must be ≥0.0% and ≤0.2%.
monitoring_signals: Euro area industrial production and retail sales
German and French national GDP indicators
predictions.rationale: PMIs stabilized near 50 and consumption held up modestly; growth likely flat-to-slightly positive.

predictions.text: Amazon Q3 2025 AWS net sales year-over-year growth (reported, not FX-adjusted) will be between 15% and 20%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Amazon’s Q3 2025 earnings release or 10-Q must show AWS segment net sales YoY growth ≥15% and ≤20% on a reported basis.
monitoring_signals: AWS deal announcements and backlog commentary
Peer cloud growth (Azure, Google Cloud) from earnings
USD strength headwinds/tailwinds to reported growth
predictions.rationale: Cloud demand re-accelerates on AI workloads; reported growth likely mid-to-high teens.

predictions.text: Meta Platforms Q3 2025 Reality Labs operating loss will be at or above $3.0 billion.
predictions.verification_criteria: Meta’s Q3 2025 earnings release or 10-Q must report Reality Labs operating loss ≥ $3.0B.
monitoring_signals: Reality Labs capex/opex guidance and headcount
predictions.rationale: Reality Labs remains deeply investment-heavy with limited revenue scale; sequential improvements unlikely to change loss magnitude.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS10) will close at or below 4.10% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED series DGS10 shows a daily observation ≤4.10% on any date on or before 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: Fed communications and dot path expectations
predictions.rationale: Cooler inflation and growth risks support dips in yields even amid issuance headwinds.

predictions.text: EUR/USD (EURUSD=X) will trade at or below 1.0600 on at least one UTC trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Yahoo Finance quote page for EURUSD=X shows an intraday low ≤1.0600 on any UTC trading day on or before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: DXY trend and U.S.–EU rate differentials
Energy price shocks impacting euro terms of trade
predictions.rationale: Growth divergence and higher U.S. real yields keep the dollar bid, risking a test of 1.06.

predictions.text: NYMEX WTI crude oil front-month futures (CL) will settle at or above $86.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: CME Group official settlement for front-month Light Sweet Crude Oil (CL) ≥ $86.00 on any trading day on or before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: U.S. crude inventories and product cracks
predictions.rationale: Fresh sanctions and tighter supply risks can lift prompt prices despite demand uncertainties.

predictions.text: The S&P 500 Index (^GSPC) will close down at least 1.8% day-over-day on at least one UTC trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Yahoo Finance historical data for ^GSPC shows a daily close-to-close percentage change ≤ -1.8% on any UTC trading day on or before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Earnings guidance cuts and miss rates
Rates spikes or credit spread widening
predictions.rationale: Event risk from earnings, CPI, and policy can produce at least one sharp risk-off day.

predictions.text: TSMC October 2025 consolidated revenue (NT$) year-over-year growth will be between +8% and +16%.
predictions.verification_criteria: TSMC’s monthly revenue press release for October 2025 must show YoY growth rate ≥8% and ≤16% versus October 2024.
monitoring_signals: TSMC capacity utilization and lead times
TWD exchange rate effects on reported sales
predictions.rationale: AI-related wafers offset mixed consumer demand; comps remain favorable.

predictions.text: U.S. JOLTS total job openings (SA level) for September 2025 will print between 7.4 million and 8.1 million.
predictions.verification_criteria: BLS JOLTS news release for September 2025 shows seasonally adjusted total job openings level ≥7.4m and ≤8.1m.
monitoring_signals: NFIB hiring plans and hard-to-fill positions
predictions.rationale: Openings trend down but remain elevated versus pre-pandemic; labor demand is cooling gradually.

predictions.text: ICE Endex Dutch TTF front-month natural gas will settle at or below €34.00/MWh on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: ICE Endex official settlement price for Dutch TTF front-month futures ≤ €34.00/MWh on any trading day on or before the deadline.
predictions.rationale: Storage is exceptionally high and weather benign so far, pressuring prompt prices barring major supply shocks.
